document.full_text: an elementary school was locked down on friday for about two hours as police looked for a murder suspect in the area, but he was arrested without incident, police and school officials said.
document.title: los angeles school briefly "locked down" for manhunt
lines_and_colors: an elementary school was locked down on friday for about two hours as police looked for a murder suspect in the area, but he was arrested without incident, police and school officials said.
